history.proof: intros. unfold Derive. destruct H. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: apply Derive_ext_loc with (f := RInt f a).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R x : posreal H : forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball b x y -> ex_RInt f a y H0 : continuous f b Unable to unify "Derive (RInt f a) ?M2372 = Derive ?M2371 ?M2372" with "Lim (fun h : R => (RInt f a (b + h) - RInt f a b) / h) 0 = f b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R

Goal:
locally b (ex_RInt f a) -> continuous f b -> Derive (RInt f a) b = f b

Premises:
continuous = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (f : T -> U) (x : T) => filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> U) -> T -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
RInt = fun (V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => iota (is_RInt f a b) : forall V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
ex_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) => exists If : V, is_RInt f a b If : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
abs_RInt_le_const : forall (f : R -> R) (a b M : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> (forall t : R, a <= t <= b -> Rabs (f t) <= M) -> Rabs (RInt f a b) <= (b - a) * M
Derive_ext_loc : forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) -> Derive f x = Derive g x
RInt_lt : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous f x) -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x < g x) -> RInt f a b < RInt g a b
abs_RInt_le : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> Rabs (RInt f a b) <= RInt (fun t : R => Rabs (f t)) a b
RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= RInt f a b
ex_RInt_Reals_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> Riemann_integrable f a b
ex_RInt_Reals_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> ex_RInt f a b
RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt g a b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RInt f a b <= RInt g a b
is_RInt_ge_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b If : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 <= f x) -> 0 <= If
RInt_Reals : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b), RInt f a b = RiemannInt pr
ex_RInt_Reals_aux_1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b), is_RInt f a b (RiemannInt pr)
is_RInt_le : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b If Ig : R), a <= b -> is_RInt f a b If -> is_RInt g a b Ig -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> If <= Ig
RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> R
RiemannInt_P16 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
ex_RInt_norm : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), ex_RInt f a b -> ex_RInt (fun x : R => norm (f x)) a b
RMicromega.RTautoChecker_sound : forall (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula RMicromega.Rcst)) (w : seq RMicromega.RWitness), RMicromega.RTautoChecker f w = true -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv R, Tauto.eval_bf (RMicromega.Reval_formula env) f
is_RInt = fun (V : NormedModule R_AbsRing) (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (If : V) => filterlim (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum f ptd)) (Riemann_fine a b) (locally If) : forall V : NormedModule R_AbsRing, (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V -> Prop Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
is_derive_RInt_0 : forall (f0 If : R -> ?V) (a0 : R), locally a0 (fun b0 : R_UniformSpace => is_RInt f0 a0 b0 (If b0)) -> continuous f0 a0 -> is_derive If a0 (f0 a0) where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
continuous_minus : forall (f0 g : ?U -> ?V) (x : ?U), continuous f0 x -> continuous g x -> continuous (fun x0 : ?U => minus (f0 x0) (g x0)) x where ?U : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- UniformSpace] ?K : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
is_derive_RInt : forall (f0 If : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), locally b0 (fun b1 : R_UniformSpace => is_RInt f0 a0 b1 (If b1)) -> continuous f0 b0 -> is_derive If b0 (f0 b0) where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
filterlim_locally_unique = fun (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V) (x y : V) => is_filter_lim_unique x y : forall (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> V) (x y : V), filterlim f F (locally x) -> filterlim f F (locally y) -> x = y Arguments T, K, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _ _]
is_derive_RInt' : forall (f0 If : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), locally a0 (fun a1 : R_UniformSpace => is_RInt f0 a1 b0 (If a1)) -> continuous f0 a0 -> is_derive If a0 (opp (f0 a0)) where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
RInt_gt_0 : forall (g : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> 0 < g x) -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuous g x) -> 0 < RInt g a b
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
RInt_Chasles : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 c : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> ex_RInt f0 b0 c -> plus (RInt f0 a0 b0) (RInt f0 b0 c) = RInt f0 a0 c where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- UniformSpace]
BinIntDef.Z.quotrem = fun a b : Z => match a with | 0%Z => (0%Z, 0%Z) | Z.pos a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in (BinIntDef.Z.of_N q, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, BinIntDef.Z.of_N r) end | Z.neg a0 => match b with | 0%Z => (0%Z, a) | Z.pos b0 => let (q, r) := N.pos_div_eucl a0 (N.pos b0) in ((- BinIntDef.Z.of_N q)%Z, (- BinIntDef.Z.of_N r)%Z) | Z.neg b0 => let (q, r) := N...
RInt_minus : forall (f0 g : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> ex_RInt g a0 b0 -> RInt (fun x : R => minus (f0 x) (g x)) a0 b0 = minus (RInt f0 a0 b0) (RInt g a0 b0) where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_map = fun (T T0 : Type) (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- SF_t s] |} : forall T T0 : Type, (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Arguments T, T0 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _]
is_derive = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (f : K -> V) (x : K) (l : V) => filterdiff f (locally x) (fun y : K => scal y l) : forall (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), (K -> V) -> K -> V -> Prop Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _ _]
RInt_correct : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 -> is_RInt f0 a0 b0 (RInt f0 a0 b0) where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
ex_RInt_continuous : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a0 b0 : R), (forall z : R, Rmin a0 b0 <= z <= Rmax a0 b0 -> continuous f0 z) -> ex_RInt f0 a0 b0 where ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f0 ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f0 x))) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?U : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- UniformSpace] ?F : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Filter ?F]
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> x = y where ?K : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- NormedModule ?K]
Proper_StrongProper : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter' F where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_size_map : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_map f0 s) = SF_size s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]
SF_map_lx : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f0 s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R |- Type]

```coq
intros. unfold Derive. intros. destruct H. apply Derive_ext_loc with (f := RInt f a). auto.
Qed.```
